good morning! my FRC team is trying do this:

Captura de tela 2025-04-26 175007800×485 379 KB

Someone know which program the Orbit 1690 use?

Not sure what Orbit uses exactly, but our team uses elastic to do something similar. It would probably work for your use case.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2025-06-11T22:13:50.634Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":368,"readers_count":367,"score":78.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":503059,"topic_slug":"frc-table","display_username":"Arnav Ranjan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63253,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"complicated solutions to simple problems"},"post_url":"/t/frc-table/503059/2","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3651217,"name":"","username":"Nummun14","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nummun14/{size}/254803_2.png","created_at":"2025-06-11T22:23:46.524Z","cooked":"

Orbit made their own custom dashboard which AFAIK isn’t public. However there are a bunch of public dashboards out there that you can use. I personally recommend using Elastic as it is very easy to set up and has a wide variety of widgets. You can find more info about it here:

FIRST Robotics Competition Documentation

Elastic

Elastic is a simple and modern dashboard made by Team 353. It is meant to be used behind the glass as a competition driver dashboard, but it can also be used for testing. It was built with the goal...

As mentioned before, we use a custom dashboard which is not public. It’s written in Flutter, mainly to match all the other non-robot projects on our team

Thanks for the answer! But I have a question. How can I create an interactive box in Elastic? Can I create a box where I can choose an option from among others in a list?
